ACTIVATED_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: {1}: Blinkmoth Nexus becomes a 1/1 Blinkmoth artifact creature with flying until end of turn. It’s still a land.
{1}: Il Nexus dei Lampidotteri diventa una creatura artefatto Lampidottero 1/1 con volare fino alla fine del turno. È ancora una terra.
{1}: Der Blinkmotten-Nexus wird bis zum Ende des Zuges zu einer 1/1 Blinkmotten-Artefaktkreatur mit Flugfähigkeit. Er ist immer noch ein Land.
{1} : Le Nexus des scintimites devient une créature-artefact 1/1 Scintimite avec le vol jusqu’à la fin du tour. C’est toujours un terrain.
{1}: El Nexo de polillas titilantes se convierte en una criatura Polilla titilante artefacto 1/1 con la habilidad de volar hasta el final del turno. Sigue siendo una tierra.
{1}：ターン終了時まで、ちらつき蛾の生息地は飛行を持つ1/1のちらつぎ蛾アーティファクト・クリーチャーになる。 それは土地でもある。
{1}: Blinkmoth Nexus becomes a 1/1 Blinkmoth artifact creature with flying until end of turn. It’s still a land.
{1}: Blinkmoth Nexus becomes a 1/1 Blinkmoth artifact creature with flying until end of turn. It’s still a land.
{1}: Nexo de Mosco-lumes torna-se, até o final do turno, uma criatura artefato 1/1 , com a habilidade de voar, do tipo Mosco-lume. Ela ainda é um terreno.
ACTIVATED_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local target = Object() if target ~= nil then local characteristics = target:GetCurrentCharacteristics() characteristics:CardType_GetWritable(target):Add( CARD_TYPE_ARTIFACT, target ) characteristics:CardType_GetWritable(target):Add( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE, target ) end
local target = Object() if target ~= nil then local characteristics = target:GetCurrentCharacteristics() characteristics:Power_Set( 1 ) characteristics:Toughness_Set( 1 ) end
local target = Object() if target ~= nil then target:GetCurrentCharacteristics():SubType_GetWritable(target):Add( CREATURE_TYPE_BLINKMOTH, target ) end
local target = Object() if target ~= nil then local characteristics = target:GetCurrentCharacteristics() characteristics:Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_FLYING, 1 ) end

ACTIVATED_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: {1}, {T}: Target Blinkmoth creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
{1}, {T}: La creatura Lampidottero bersaglio prende +1/+1 fino alla fine del turno.
{1}, {T}: Eine Blinkmotte deiner Wahl erhält +1/+1 bis zum Ende des Zuges.
{1}, {T} : La scintimite ciblée gagne +1/+1 jusqu’à la fin du tour.
{1}, {T}: La Polilla titilante objetivo obtiene +1/+1 hasta el final del turno.
{1}, {T}：ちらつき蛾１体を対象とする。それはターン終了時まで+1/+1の修正を受ける。
{1}, {T}: Target Blinkmoth creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
{1}, {T}: Target Blinkmoth creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
{1}, {T}: O Mosco-lume alvo recebe +1/+1 até o final do turno.
ACTIVATED_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:AddSubType( CREATURE_TYPE_BLINKMOTH ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ALLIED_ONLY, EffectController() )
ACTIVATED_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local target = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) if target ~= nil then local characteristics = target:GetCurrentCharacteristics() characteristics:Power_Add( 1 ) characteristics:Toughness_Add( 1 ) end
